pages.text: Having created an alchemical infusion, I saw a vision of the first of the four wise elves laying out the following ingredients on the alchemical table:[empty, crystal phial, kelp, light stone dust, blowfish, empty] and receives the spirit of the sea.
The second elf puts the following ingredients on the alchemical table:[empty, crystal phial, fire powder, glowstone dust, nether wart, empty] and receives fire water.
The third elf puts the following ingredients on the alchemical table:[empty, crystal phial, grass, glowstone dust, earth, empty] and receives turf extract.
The fourth elf on the alchemical table puts the following ingredients:[empty, crystal phial, feather, glowstone dust, phantom membrane, empty] and receives wind reflection.
Most likely, these are not ready-to-use potions, but ingredients...
